title.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), May 6, 1900. Peter B. Olson Renominated as Representative for the Eleventh District

div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), May 6, 1900. PETER B. OLSON RENOMINATED AS REPRESENTATIVE FOR THE ELEVENTH DISTRICT

body.p: The delegates for the senatorial convention for the Eleventh District met last Saturday in Schoenhofen's hall. Police Judge Olaf Severson was elected chairman. As representatives of the District the following were nominated: Peter B. Olson, of Ward 15; etc. The representatives were under mandate to work for the re-election of Senator Cullom as United States Senator from Illinois.
